meanings.definition: The lower or inner curve of an arch.
meanings.sent1: The intradoses of the arch were beautifully carved.
meanings.sent2: Architects study the intradoses to understand the structure of the arch.
meanings.sent3: The intradoses of the arch giggled as they supported the weight above.
meanings.sent4: The intradoses of the arch embraced the keystone tightly.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the intradoses made the arch stand out.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed various intradoses from different arches.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the collection of intradoses in the exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The intradoses in the museum seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The intradoses in the exhibit room whispered stories of ancient structures.
meanings.sent5: The colorful intradoses added a vibrant touch to the museum display.
